Share

Home
====

Welcome to our Portal! Our community prides itself on strong, long running traditions. One of these traditions is getting our community engaged with what is going on at City Hall. We are pleased to introduce our Portal. The portal increases transparency by enabling our citizens to learn about meetings, search for documents, view reports, and more!

Within our Portal, you can:

* **Search** for documents in our online library
* **Subscribe** to meetings that interest you
* View upcoming and past meetings using the **Calendar**
* Review agendas and minutes within the **Meeting** area
* Submit requests and report concerns using our **Citizen Engagement** forms
* View the **Attendance & Voting** patterns of elected officials

* [Meet Your Council](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/portal/members.aspx?id=10)
  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  ![Untitled (2).png](https://i.civicweb.net/Global/Images/portal/550/welcome-tile.jpg)
* [Live Stream](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/Portal/Video.aspx)
  ----------------------------------------------------------------------

  View our live stream to watch meetings as they happen at City Hall.

  ![View current or upcoming live stream event](https://i.civicweb.net/Global/Images/portal/300/video-tile.jpg)
* [Search](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/Portal/VirtualLibrary.aspx)
  --------------------------------------------------------------------------

  Looking for a report, published agenda, or other document? Check out our easy to search online library.

  ![search](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/content/portal/Tiles/300/virtual-library-tile.jpg)
* [Subscribe](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/Portal/Subscribe.aspx)
  ------------------------------------------------------------------------

  Subscribe to receive email updates for meetings that interest you.

  ![subscribe](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/content/portal/Tiles/300/subscribe-tile.jpg)
* [Board/Committee Application](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/Portal/BoardApplication)
  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  Apply for City’s boards, committees or commissions.

  ![Apply for a Board or Commission](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/content/portal/Tiles/250/boardapplication-tile.jpg)
* [Attendance & Voting](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/Portal/VotingRecords.aspx)
  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  Using Attendance and Voting, you can view if an elected official attended a meeting and see how they voted on various topics.

  ![voting](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/content/portal/Tiles/300/attendance-voting-tile.jpg)
* [Code of Ordinances](https://z2codes.franklinlegal.net/franklin/Z2Browser2.html?showset=springtownset)
  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  ![gavel](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/content/portal/Tiles/300/custom-tile-3456.jpg)
* [Meetings - Live Archive](https://studio.youtube.com/channel/UCRSmAVKDALEXZ_YEOQWy-3Q/videos/live?filter=%5B%5D&sort=%7B%22columnType%22%3A%22date%22%2C%22sortOrder%22%3A%22DESCENDING%22%7D)
  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  ![folders](https://cityofspringtown.civicweb.net/content/portal/Tiles/250/custom-tile-3457.jpg)
* ![Placeholder](https://i.civicweb.net/Global/Images/portal/300/filler-1-tile.jpg)
